definition: extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me

sentences.english: My extracurricular activities include the Math and Drama Clubs.
sentences.chinese: 我的课余活动包括参加数学兴趣小组和戏剧社。

sentences.english: When I was in college, I spent some of my spare time working as a math tutor for people in the lower-level mathematics classes.
sentences.chinese: 在大学时，我利用课余时间为数学较差的学生补习。

sentences.english: She reviewed the rest part in lesson 101 this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，她复习了第一百零一课余下的部分。

sentences.english: In spare time, we can talk to each other or join some activities together.
sentences.chinese: 课余时间，我们可以一起交流，一起参加一些活动。

sentences.english: In addition, after-school time for a combination of theory and practice.
sentences.chinese: 此外在课余时间进行理论与实践的结合。

sentences.english: She dictated the rest content of lesson 79 this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午，她听写了第七十九课余下的内容。

sentences.english: Homework refers to tasks assigned by teachers that completed by students during extra-curriculum time.
sentences.chinese: 家庭作业是教师布置给学生在课余时间完成的任务。

sentences.english: They are just regular student who loves play ball after school. However, if 5u come to toronto.
sentences.chinese: 他们只是一群在课余时间里喜欢打篮球的学生们。

sentences.english: He always plays games with us in our spare time.
sentences.chinese: 课余时间他常和我们做游戏。

sentences.english: True team-building, however, took place during the away day.
sentences.chinese: 然而，真正的团队建设，却是在课余完成的。

sentences.english: After class she often helps us learn patiently.
sentences.chinese: 课余她经常很耐心的帮助我们学习。

sentences.english: Ma Yun's main business is still teaching, can only use their spare time to take care of translation.
sentences.chinese: 马云的主业还是教书，只能用课余时间打理翻译社。

sentences.english: After school time, still often take shellfish to go out have fun.
sentences.chinese: 课余的时候，还常常带贝出去玩耍。

sentences.english: The students have lots of clubs to join in their spare time.
sentences.chinese: 学生们在课余时间可以参加许多俱乐部。

sentences.english: Teach the children how to play Chinese Yoyo outside class.
sentences.chinese: 第三，利用课余时间教孩子们抖空竹。

sentences.english: My daughter learned the left part of lesson 87 this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，我女儿学习了第八十七课余下的部分。

definition: to work part time while studying/work-study program
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
to take extra lessons in a cram school or with a private tutor
to read a book/to study/to attend school
to teach classes in addition to other duties/to hold several teaching jobs
to give classes/to work as a teacher
to teach as substitute for absent teacher
